item.description:
Meet monthly with a local group of healers and those who want to learn more about Reiki and Energy Healing.     The Healer Share is really GREAT!

We get a large number of people every month, and we really need Reiki people to come and work the tables with us.   It doesn't matter what level you are; you will be more than welcome and we have plenty of tables.

 

We usually have a line of laypeople waiting for healing sessions, so you will really be helping us out if you can come.

 

We have Reiki practitioners and other energy modalities in one room.  Full Spectrum students and practitioners from the Rhys Thomas Institute of Energy Medicine are in a second room, so you can get a free Full Spectrum session too.


There are also other energy healers offering modalities such as Quantum Touch, The Reconnection, Yuen Method & Shamanic healing.    People wanting to receive can often choose from and receive 2-3 different modalities in the 2 hours.

 

Come join us for an evening of fun, friendship and healing - you won't be disappointed.  :

(RSVPs on Meetup aren't a good gauge of monthly attendance since most who attend bring their friends and don't have meetup.com accounts)
item.name: The Metrowest Reiki and Energy Healers Share
